response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which holds immense value for you at $1,500,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire it at a carefully considered price. My proposal is to offer this remarkable product to you for $1,200,000. This price reflects a strategic balance between maximizing my earnings and ensuring your satisfaction with the investment. I believe this offer presents a unique chance for both of us to benefit significantly. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
